texts: bbc.com
Banksy chimpanzee MPs painting up for auction
To set yourself apart as a business in the CHAOS of the Digital Age, you have to master Ancient ART of StoryTelling...
StoryTelling is all the rage in marketing these days.
But Despite what most 'GURUs' say, it's not about YOUR Story.
Nobody wants you to hire pretty girls to stand in the background.
Nobody wants to see you sitting in a home (you don't own) with a beach behind you.
Nobody cares if you are driving a car you can barely afford to rent (let alone buy) while you record your video...
Nobody wants you to pretend to live a life just to impress them...
Nobody is interested in funding your make-money-while-you-sleep lifestyle.
It's not about you and how you started with nothing and spent 24 hours a day 7 days a week building your business.
Nobody cares about how hard you say you worked (even if it's true).
Nobody cares about YOUR Story.
They care about THEIR Story.
StoryTelling in the Digital Age is an art you must master to be successful.
But it's time to understand what this really means.
Writing a STORY that will GROW your Business starts here.
Enter the story your ideal client is telling themselves about why their life is horrible...
Show them you understand THEIR story, and show them it's possible to write a better story.
Show them it's possible to invest in a better future with your product or service.
It's not Rocket Science.
It's actually harder than that.
Because this is the key to success in business.
Finding your hero (your ideal client) and helping them write a better story for their lives (with the story you write for them).
Change happens when your ideal client chooses to invest in a better future.
If you have a product or a service that will change someone's life, then you have to get them (your ideal client) to BELIEVE in they can have a future.
Your hero (your ideal client) must believe they can change the story of their miserable life to get the better future they want.
If you can help them do this, they will pay you, and you will grow your business.
Once you get this part right, (the story), then success in business is possible.
But that's the easy part - a strategy that will work.
Then comes the hard part...
Executing the StoryTelling online.
It used to be so easy.
One newspaper ad. One radio ad. One television commercial.
If you nailed it, that would change your business.
But now it's infinitely more complex.
Facebook, Google, Landing Pages, videos, funnels, split testing, remarketing, and the list goes on...
To successfully deliver your story online, you have to map it all out in detail.
The pace of change in digital marketing is dizzying.
And if you are not committed to keeping up with it, then you will be left behind.
If you want to learn more about how to master the Ancient Art of StoryTelling, and how to deliver it in the Digital World Successfully...
Join the StoryMatters MasterClass.
4 Powerful Lessons on how to use the Ancient Art of StoryTelling in the Digital Age.
2 Hours of the Best Free Marketing Training in the World
(over 70,000 Business Owners have subscribed, with hundreds more each day).

Lesson 1 - Why Story Matters (Now more than ever) Lesson 2 - Who is Your Hero? (HINT: It's not you) Lesson 3 - Writing Your Hero's Journey (Be YODA, not LUKE) Lesson 4 - Mapping Your Hero's Digital Journey (It's harder than you think)
To join the StoryMatters MasterClass, take a Short test we have Designed to find your Influencer SuperPower.
Take the Survey, and you will get a personal video on what you need to do to start leveraging your power as an Influencer.
Click Here to Take the Influencer Test & Get Your StoryMatters MasterClass
